description:
Light filled studio apartment with charming decor located right in the heart of Murray Hill. Doorman and elevator building. 

Attractions in the area include: Top of the Rock, Empire State Building, Many grocery stores, restaurants and pharmacies

Close to the 6 train
name: Charming Studio in the Heart of Murray Hill
review: A beautiful little apartment perfect for one or for a couple. Everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay (kitchen, bath tub, large comfy bed, good wifi and television). Perfect location for seeing all the sights the city has to offer: close to the subway, supermarket downstairs in the building and just a street away from the Empire State! Everything we needed to make or trip extra special (and a lovely balcony view of Third Avenue was the icing on the cake!).
